bioAsHtml: Tim Prijn is Co-Founder of Mindloops. Besides his day time job consulting companies in Agile (architecting), Tim loves to share knowledge through presentations (TestDays, JavaOne) and as an editor and writer for Java Magazine. Tim's primary interests are in proces, architectures and of course hardcore programming.​
